instructions: Determine if devices are eligible to be unlocked: Mobile Wireless Device Unlocking . Contact Customer Care to request the Mobile Device Unlock code for your phone. Insert a Non-T-Mobile SIM & turn the phone on. Once the device is powered on, the screen should display 'Invalid SIM card Network lock.' From any Home screen, tap Phone. Enter 2945#*769# . If necessary, tap Service Provider Lock . Enter the unlock code. Tap Done > Unlock . If you receive any error messages after attempting to permanently or temporarily unlock your device, contact customer care to inform them of the issues you are receiving.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under SYSTEM , tap Date and time . Tap Automatic time zone to select the check box. Tap Automatic date and time to select the check box.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under SYSTEM , tap Date and time . Tap Automatic date and time to clear the check box. 'Set date' and 'Set time' light up and are now accessible. Tap Set date to set the date. When finished, tap Set . Tap Set time to set the time. When finished, tap Set .
